name: Project Tristars
storyline: This game's scenarios continues from the live dramas in 3 Majesty×X.I.P. LIVE -SPLASH SUMMER FES 2017-. Its presentation is meant to be a live documentary, as each member recalls their group origins to a faceless and mute camera man working with the director. Unlike previous instances, Project TRISTARS provides in-depth personal insights and illustrated content for about five months of the groups' formations.
summary:
The previous activities for the 5th anniversary of the debut of the idol group "3 Majesty" "XIP" is recorded. You can enjoy their documentary from a new aspect, by choosing valuable scenes of the idols 
Video of the performance of "3 Majesty × XIP LIVE - SPLASH SUMMER FES 2017" held at DMM VR THEATER in August 2017 and footage of the popular "Victory Live" at the app version "Tokimeki Restaurant" Total 15 or more recorded 
All the visuals displayed in important scenes of documentaries are photographed by Makoto Maekazaki. You can see not only the idols that you always expected but also the new aspect of them such as how to strive behind the scenes
